ygData.subject: Re: Couple Answers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Kilji quest starts in Kelethin, go down past the Ranger and Druid guilds, there is a smith shop, there is a guy standing outside the shop who talks
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----

: From: "Rick Wood" <eggmanjr@...>

: Yes i do know where the plans come from, can you please send more info to
: the list as to where the quest starts from please, at any rate the plans
: come off a SG in so ro, hes not named however he is distinguished by being
: much lower level than a sg normally is, mid to hight twenties instead of
: thirties. Now that i have helped you please help me and tell me where the
: quest starts.

The Kilji quest starts in Kelethin, go down past the Ranger and Druid
guilds, there is a smith shop, there is a guy standing outside the shop who
talks about them. He wants the plans and (I think) 3 enchanted gold bars, or
something like that. Good luck!

Now that I have helped you, please please please SOMEONE take pity upon my
weary form and tell me who to talk to to start the Hero Bracer quest!! Only
lead I have is that it is somewhere in Qeynos, probably... well whoopee,
there's only like fifty dozen NPCs there.

Please someone help.
